sentences.en: 'Come away, Hawkins,'he would say;'come and have yarn with John.
sentences.cn: “ 快进来, 霍金斯, ” 他会说, “ 快来和约翰聊聊天.

sentences.en: Craft Resources also sells yarn and embroidery floss.
sentences.cn: 工艺人员服务公司也售卖纱线和绣花丝线。

sentences.en: Don't give me some cooked - up yarn!
sentences.cn: 不要讲编造的故事给我听!

sentences.en: Doug has a yarn or two to tell me about his trips into the bush.
sentences.cn: 道格要给我讲几个他到荒野地区旅行的奇遇故事。

sentences.en: He spun a yarn about his friendship with the royal family.
sentences.cn: 他胡诌了一通所谓他与王室之间友情的故事.

sentences.en: His grandmother spun him a yarn at the fire.
sentences.cn: 他奶奶在火炉边给他讲故事.

sentences.en: I stopped to have a yarn with him.
Men yarn of the harbour's famous pilots.
sentences.cn: 人们常讲该港口的一些著名领港员的故事.

sentences.en: Rukmeni's a great storyteller, so she'll probably spin them a yarn about some prince or god.
sentences.cn: 鲁克马尼非常善于讲故事，她有可能给他们编个什么王子或神的故事。

sentences.en: She still spins the yarn and knits sweaters for her family.
sentences.cn: 她仍然纺纱为家人织毛线衫。

sentences.en: The basic structural unit of yarn is the fiber.
sentences.cn: 纤维是纱的基本结构单元.

sentences.en: The begger spun a long yarn about his misfortume.
sentences.cn: 乞丐虚讲出一大篇关于自己如何不幸的故事.

sentences.en: The kitten snarled the yarn by playing with it.
sentences.cn: 小猫玩纱线,弄得一团糟.

sentences.en: The little girl tangled the yarn her mother was knitting.
sentences.cn: 小女孩把她妈妈在编结的毛线弄得纠结在一起了.

sentences.en: The old captain would often spin (= tell ) us a yarn about life aboard ship.
sentences.cn: 老船长经常会给我们讲一些船上生活的奇闻轶事。

sentences.en: These forces may cause fiber slippage within the yarn structure.
sentences.cn: 这些力会引起纱线结构内部纤维的滑脱.

phrases.tran_cn: 粒纱；粗节纱；竹节花式纱
变形纱；光亮纱线；膨松纱；结构纱；花色纱

trans.tran_cn: 纱，线，（尤指）毛线，故事，（旅行）轶事
trans.tran_en: thick thread made of cotton or wool, which is used to knit things
